name: Coral (Bloomsburytales)
description:
ANGEL, a coral reef fish,  swims a tour to her favorite place and finds new Guppy friends on her way. 

Go on an ADVENTURE with  ANGEL and the Guppies you collect!

HOW many guppy friends can you COLLECT?...and  COLLECT hidden gems!

  • Play the surprising adventure of a coral fish again and again
  • Tap your way through a fun, relaxing and feel-good journey
  • Explore the colourfull game world under the sea
  • Includes 2 kinds of Play Mode

Published and Developed by:

Bloomsburytales & Minjo Magics © All Rights Reserved
